author: GamingBolt
description:
Gears of War: Reloaded's presence on the PlayStation 5 is an excellent showcase of how Sony's gaming powerhouse has become a very attractive option for developers who may not have chosen the platform in the past. 

Aside from a very solid gameplay experience made even better by the PS5's unique strengths, the fact that this once Xbox-exclusive franchise is now playable on the PS showcases a shift towards a gaming industry in which console-exclusivity has made way for a more player-focused approach to releases new and old. 

Aside from the potential to create more ambitious projects that bring larger communities of players together, this shift cements the PlayStation as a great option for single-player blockbusters, and a console that, like the Gears franchise, has withstood the test of time.
title: Gears of War Reloaded PS5 Proves PlayStation Is Now The True Home of Single Player Blockbusters

author: GamingBolt
description:
The time has finally come. After its announcement in February 2019 and many delays later, Hollow Knight: Silksong launches on September 4th for Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, PS4, PS5, PC, Nintendo Switch and Switch 2. 

It's an auspicious occasion – several other developers have already delayed their games to get out of the way – but what is there to know about Silksong? Besides serving as a follow-up to one of the best games ever made, what are some new mechanics and features that players can look forward to? Let's dive into all of them here.
title: Hollow Knight Silksong - 15 Things You NEED TO KNOW Before You Buy
